A demonstration of using dom-autoscroller with the dragula library.

Drag the elements in the lists around. Holding the pointer (mouse/touch) near the edge of the element makes the element scroll.

  1. zero
  2. one
  3. two
  4. three
  5. four
  6. five
  7. six

  9. eight
  10. nine
  11. ten
  12. eleven
  13. twelve
  14. thirteen
  15. fourteen
  16. fifteen
